segments.text: I guess I'm just a little nervous . I'm giving everything I have to invoking , and ...
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: and what if it doesn't work out , right ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You need to quit thinking like a loser . invoking is going to kick butt . You know how I know ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Because I won't let it fail .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But what about tomorrow ? What if Stars.com decides to go with WebTracker , and not us ?
segments.speaker: S1
